Belgium:
Work starts on Henri-Joseph Rega's new wing on the University Hall (Leuven).
Shares in the Ostend Company issued on Antwerp Exchange.
Chile: After 30 years of peace, the War of Arauco resumes with a Mapuche uprising.
France: Louis XV Became the new King of France.
